revised_title: Fossil Mammals of Australia: Description of a Marsupial Carnivore Skull
tldr: The author describes the discovery and analysis of a mutilated skull of a large marsupial carnivore, Thylacoleo carnifex, found in Australia. The skull and its features provide insights into the anatomy, affinities, and evolutionary relationships of this extinct species and its connection to other marsupials.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Vertebrate Zoology > Mammalogy > Marsupials
